name: Lone Defender (LoneDefender)
description:
When humanity is on the edge of decline, when the uprising of machine destroyed the world, when there's only one hope left. The Lone Defender rise.

Defend the last stronghold of humanity against the horde of drones and killing machine sent after what's left of humanity.

Description

Lone Defender is an asymetric game where a mobile player plays as the invader : the army of robot attacking the Lone Defender the player in VR.

While the Lone Defender must survive and ensure its platform stays up and healthy a horde of machine will try to destroy two generators holding it together.

Required Equipments:

VR headset / Oculus : you'll need a VR headset to play Lone Defender as the defender.

SteamVR : Lone Defender will be on your Steam library, you'll need the Oculus Link or Air Link to play on your headset.

Don't you guys have phones : As the attacker, you'll need to install Lone Defender on your mobile as well, available on the Google Play store for Android.

Local multiplayer : Lone Defender is made to be played together, couch gaming, to share the headset on an evening of games and laughter, you'll need to be set up on the same connexion to play together.

How to play

Lone Defender is an asymetric game, while the Lone Defender on VR will be moving his arms and use his reflexes to destroy his enemies, the mobile gamer, like a cold calculated machine, will be masterminding the end of mankind.

VR gamer :

Fight for your life, use your weapons : The Energy Shield, Techno-Sword, Gravity Gun.

Combine their effect to create powerful combo and explosions.

Survive

On mobile

Prepare your attacks, drag and drop your units, select your target.

Use tactics to set up your attacks and fish for the most powerful units you can send out to the fray
